content: When it comes to Wasm and DWARF, lldb-9 – which is part of the CI testing – is rather old. lldb-10 is out for a month now. How do folks think about adding lldb-10 to the CI vs. upgrading from lldb-9 to lldb-10?
Seems reasonable to me. @Yury Delendik, wdyt?
that's fine as long as we can install it on CI

I have floated a test balloon for Windows as https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/1625 .
We'll see how that behaves. Not sure whether the Linux/macOS environments allow parallel installation of two LLVM versions...
(nix, anyone? :-)
Ideas welcome.

Try LLVM-10.0.0 for Windows by ggreif · Pull Request #1625 · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
GitHub is home to over 40 million developers working together to host and review code, manage projects, and build software together.
